sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {LessonPackage} from "../lessonPackage.interface"; import {Router} from "@angular/router"; import {UserSettingsService} from "../user-settings.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-lesson-edit-form', templateUrl: './lesson-edit-form.component.html' }) export class LessonEditFormComponent { constructor(private router: Router, private userSettingsService:UserSettingsService){} onClickSubmit(){ this.userSettingsService.lastLessonId = 1234; this.router.navigate(['lesson-list-page']).then(res => {}) } lessonPackage: LessonPackage = { title: '', description: '', category: '', level: '', prerequisite: [], tags: [], copyright: ''}; }
